course_title: Special Topics in African American Studies: Methods in Afr. Amer. Studies
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 20 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as SOC 289 3)
(This course aims to provide students with an empirical portrait of Black America. Together we will explore the economic, political, and social conditions of Black Americans, with attention to the variety of social science methods employed to examine them.)
course_description: Wide range of topics pertinent to the African American experience.
sections: Class Nbr: 5305, Section #: 3, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: J. Easley, Status: Open
